titleStmt.title: A decade of grievances, presented and approved to the right honourable and High Court of Parliament, against the hierarchy or government of the Lord Bishops, and their dependant offices, by a multitude of people, who are sensible of the ruine of religion, the sinking of the state, and of the plots and insultations of enemies against both.
titleStmt.author: Leighton, Alexander, 1568-1649, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Title page has woodcut illustration with an accompanying couplet.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
